articles.description: The Wales captain was not planned to start the game but there was always due to be a late fitness test to deem whether he would be fit enough to play some part against Belgium
articles.content:
Wales have suffered a major blow in the hours leading up to their crunch clash with Belgium as captain Gareth Bale has been ruled out of the clash entirely.
The Real Madrid forward was taken off at … [+1814 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Phil Neville promotes his son Harvey, 19, into Inter Miami squad after axing 10 stars - Daily Mail
articles.description: Neville, a close friend of Beckham's since they graduated from Manchester United's youth academy together, blamed a salary cap imposed on Miami for the 'brutal' player cuts.
articles.content: Phil Neville, who is the manager for David Beckham's Inter Miami MLS franchise, has axed 10 players from his underperforming squad, while also promoting his own teenage son Harvey to the first team. … [+7751 chars]
